primary_outcome: Confirm access + tenant capabilities; create required Richpanel teams/tags; choose webhook auth approach.
Create AWS accounts/roles/secrets; pick IaC; build CI gates so every change is safe-by-default.
Deploy serverless ingestion + queue + worker skeleton with idempotency/state, feature flags, and baseline observability.
Implement Richpanel action layer + LLM routing policy engine; ship **route-only** end-to-end in staging.

sprint_name: Sprint 4 — Automation + order status + security baseline
primary_outcome: Add Tier 1 safe-assist and Tier 2 verified order-status automation; enforce redaction + auth + dashboards.
Execute smoke + load/soak; perform first production deploy (routing-only) and progressive enablement; finalize ops hardening.
Optional enhancements that are not required for initial production routing/automation.
